p: The Na +/K + ratio is a biomarker of mineralocorticoid receptor antagonism. 37 The greater Na +/K + indicates as the substance has greater proportion of Na + excretion capacity than K + and signaled good diuretic activities. 38 Therefore, comparatively FSAE400 has an interesting natriuretic activity (ie 1.86), preventing hypokalemia, a common problem associated with most diuretic agents.
